## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G32272](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G32272)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>UGNT1</u>
- **Gene Name:** UDP-GlcNAc transporter 1
- **Description:**   Nucleotide/sugar transporter family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT4G32272.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT4G32272.1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT4G32272.2](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT4G32272.2)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SAIL_1262_C12]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Almost complete loss of fucosyl as well as xylosyl epitopes; over 80% of the mutants contained GlcNAc2Man5; virtually devoid of complex and hybrid N-glycans; GIPCs display altered GlcNAcylation.
   - [ugnt1-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Almost complete loss of fucosyl as well as xylosyl epitopes; over 80% of the mutants contained GlcNAc2Man5; virtually devoid of complex and hybrid N-glycans; GIPCs display altered GlcNAcylation.
## Literature:
   - [Loss of THIN EXINE2 disrupts multiple processes in the mechanism of pollen exine  formation.](https://www.doi.org/10.1093/plphys/kiab244)&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.1093/plphys/kiab244](https://www.doi.org/10.1093/plphys/kiab244);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[34618131](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/34618131/)
